repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits

summary.p:
A composite manuscript containing schoolworks:
Two cintus (449a).
The kalviyoḻukkam (449b).
Description based on the examination of the original manuscript (July 2020).
Dimensions assessed at the time of examination.

supportDesc.condition: Relatively good state of preservation, despite some cracked, truncated leaves.

additions.desc: BnF shelfmark sticker: INDIEN 449 (front cover, recto).
Shelfmark in black ink: N° 18 (f[1]r). This is the number in Velanguani Arokium's catalogue, first numbered list (f. 3r, nos. 8, 18, 19).

binding.p: Pinewood covers apparently fabricated in the BnF.

origin.origDate: Indien 449a internally dated to the year viṣu of the Jovian cycle, that is, CE 1821-1822, 1761-1762, 1701-1702, etc. See colophon (Indien 449a, U2, f[7]r, c2, 1). Bundle not dated by Vinson in Vinson et al. (1866-) nor by Cabaton (1912). Not after first mention in a catalogue (1845).

listBibl.bibl: Cabaton, Antoine. 1912. Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits indiens, indo-chinois & malayo-polynésiens. Bibliothèque nationale. Département des manuscrits. Paris: E. Leroux. — See p. 64, no. 449.
Velanguani Arokium (Vēḷāṅkaṇṇi Ārōkkiyam). 1845. Catalogue des manuscrits tamouls de la Bibliothèque royale. Manuscript, BnF NAF 5443. — See f. 3r, nos. 8, 18, 19.
Vinson, Julien & Feer, Léon & s.n. 1866-. Catalogue des manuscrits tamoul et télinga. Manuscript, BnF Indien 577. — See f. 102r, no. 417 449.

encodingDesc.p: General ― Unmarked length of ō and ē supplied. Unmarked puḷḷi supplied. Conjectural reading (text unclear) between parentheses. Supplied reading (text lost) between square brackets. Alternative readings separated by slash. In transliteration ― Unmarked elided overshort u supplied as an apostrophe. Uppercase for initial vowels. Symbols between curly brackets. Abbreviations ― c = column; f = folio; lf = library foliation; lm = left margin; r = recto; rm = right margin; u / U followed by a number = unit (codicological and/or textual); v = verso.

revisionDesc.change: Revised by Emmanuel FRANCIS. Version 1, May 2022.
